document_data.Relationships: Theris was loved by his army.
document_data.History:
In the {{yearlinkName|1357}}, Theris was on the verge of dying without an heir. Under the inspiration of his god [[Assuran]], Theris announced a [[King's Tournament|great tournament]] to choose the new king. The tournament was opened to all men and woman, both [[human]]s and [[half-elves]].

The tournament failed however, and Theris died the [[1358 DR|following year]]. After his death the city was ruled by the Imperceptor of [[Bane]], [[Kabarrath Telthaug]], who had secretly  engineered the failure of the tournament.
